The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 November is 997,379 (1,772 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 November, there were 135,248 new confirmed cases (240.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 October, there were 129,886 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 4% ( 5,362 extra cases).
